title: LeaverBuster??
body: I got kicked from the game, but i'm trying to log in and it keeps on saying my password is wrong but I swear is isn't. Will I still get a LeaverBuster? I also tried restarting my client like 8 times.

replies.body:
Leaverbuster penalties only incurred by a *recent and frequent trend of disconnections* on your account. You can find more information on the system in our [**Leaverbuster FAQ.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)

Let me know if you experience your login issue again.
